answers.answer: Do you have urine frequency or urgency? Do you have diabetes? What is your age? I think you need to have urinalysis done. Hard to diagnose right now. The funky smell could be due to protein in the urine. Is the smell sweet?

could be medication.  but i would also check out ovarian cancer. -  only becuase i have the same sensation when i pee and i got an email a couple of weeks ago with symptoms of ovarian cancer and now im curious for myself as well.
hi sounds to me like you have thrush. try a tube of canestan cream it should help.you can get it in any chemist

It only happens at night or early morning and eventually it will go away, sometimes its like 10 minutes but sometimes its hours before it goes away. I would'nt really say that it smells sweet just different. I dont have diabetes and I am 21 yrs old..

question: My bladder and vagina burns ONLY after I pee. My urine also has kind of a funky smell, this is NOT after sex. I had gone to my doctor for a urinary tract infection and I tested negative. I need help figuring out whats going on.
title: Bladder and Vagina burn...
